name: JIRA Intercom Webhook
description: A web service to connect JIRA tickets and Intercom conversations

INTERCOM_APP_ID.description: ID of your application in Intercom

INTERCOM_API_KEY.description: API key for your Intercom account

INTERCOM_ADMIN_ID.description: notes added by the webhook will be attributed to this user in Intercom

JIRA_HOSTNAME.description: hostname for your JIRA instance e.g. companyxyz.atlassian.net
